thread.title: Ground News - Emmanuel Macron promises to make 2024 a “year of determination”
thread.title_full: Ground News - Emmanuel Macron promises to make 2024 a “year of determination”

author: euractiv.fr
title: Ground News - Emmanuel Macron promises to make 2024 a “year of determination”
text:
Summary by euractiv.fr Emmanuel Macron promised to make 2024 a “year of determination” and to continue to “act” despite the difficulties that are accumulating, during his vows where he celebrated the “French prides” expected from the Olympic Games when Notre Dame reopened. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
